evidence.text:
SHELLY: Oh! Hey sweetie, oh my gosh.
HANNAH: I keep forgetting that you’re not actually a reasonable person: that you left me in the casino parking lot with a Gameboy while you did two shows a night.
SHELLY: I couldn’t afford help, Hannah--
HANNAH: You are so lucky that when Lisa saw me in the car, she didn’t turn me in to child services.
HANNAH: Career?!! What kind of career is this?? You’re in the goddamn back of 80 topless dancers! This was worth missing bedtime for most of my childhood?? ...Was it?
